thread.title: Handing out game balls following Alabama's win over Arkansas
thread.title_full: Handing out game balls following Alabama's win over Arkansas | AL.com

author: Matt Zenitz | mzenitz@al.com
title: Handing out game balls following Alabama's win over Arkansas
text:
NFL and college teams recognize players with game balls each week. So do we, identifying five players deserving of game balls following each Alabama game.
Here are the picks after the Tide's 38-10 win over Georgia on Saturday (listed alphabetically):
Senior cornerback/punt returner Cyrus Jones
Arkansas quarterback Brandon Allen was just 14 of 31 for 122 yards with one touchdown and one interception aside from a late 54-yard touchdown on Alabama redshirt freshman cornerback Marlon Humphrey.
Most of Allen's modest passing yardage total (176 yards) was gained on completions of 15, 21, 18, 21, 18 and 54 yards. None of those completions came on Jones.
Jones helped the Tide limit Razorbacks top receiver Drew Morgan to 15 yards on four catches after he posted a combined 13 catches for 265 yards in games against Texas A&M and Tennessee.
Jones also had a late 27-yard punt return. He had an early long return negated by a penalty.
Junior safety Eddie Jackson
Jackson had three tackles and an interception during the fourth quarter that he returned 20 yards to Arkansas' 13-yard line.
That set up a field goal that pushed the Tide's lead to 20-7.
Senior inside linebacker Reggie Ragland
Ragland had a team-high eight tackles, a stop for a loss, a sack, a forced fumble, a pass breakup and two quarterback hurries.
He helped Alabama limit Arkansas to 220 yards and standout running back Alex Collins to 26 yards on 12 carries.
Freshman wide receiver Calvin Ridley
Ridley had a career-high nine catches for a career-best 140 yards and a touchdown.
With the Tide trailing 7-3 late in the third quarter, Ridley caught an 81-yard momentum-changing touchdown from quarterback Jake Coker.
Junior defensive lineman A'Shawn Robinson
Robinson had five tackles and a quarterback hurry.
